title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Global Business Practice and Intercultural Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business terminology and understanding of mathematical statistics concepts
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive program for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to cultivate cultural understanding and mathematical data analysis skills in global business contexts

learning_goals: Learners can explain with over 80% accuracy how cultural differences influence decision-making processes through global business case analysis
Learners can establish market demand prediction models by culture with over 70% accuracy using data provided through mobile platforms
Learners can recognize their own cultural biases through reflective journaling and propose three or more improvement strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
